about_the_game:
Perhaps you have never seen a Schnabel Car in the real world, or even haven't known what one is yet? Now you have the chance to experience this big guy in Trainz Simulator, and use it to carry some rare goods!

The Schnabel Car is a special type of freight car, used to transport super heavy or oversized goods. Generally speaking, it has two huge 'arms' to grab the goods, and make them become a part of itself.

Features Include:

- Normal Maps.
- Interior.
- Night effects.
- Weathered.
- LOD system.
- Worker loadable.
- Supports will automatically appear when some parts are idling.
- Includes 4 Basic Chassis, 2 Main Chassis, 2 Schnabels and 1 Empty Connector.

D38 Schnabel Car was born in a distant northern city of China, Qiqihar. It is a giant beast for real, and one of the largest freight cars in China. D38 has carried large stators for the Three Gorges Hydropower Station, and it also has carried some large industrial equipment, for example: power transformers and mill stands for some industrial zones in Shanghai and Sichuan Province.

Due to its long body, you need to assemble it youself in Surveyor Mode by using the parts of D38 (4 Basic Chassis, 2 Main Chassis, 2 Schnabel and an Empty Connector ).



Product – Stator - green skin

Features Include:

- Normal Maps.
- Weathered.
- Supports will automatically appear when it is idling.

Accessory - Side Bolsters - gray skin

Features Include:

- Normal Maps.
- Weathered.
- Supports will automatically appear when it is idling.
- Product loadable.

Accessory – Depressed Center Bracket - gray skin

Features Include:

- Normal Maps.
- Weathered.
- Supports will automatically appear when it is idling.
- Product loadable.

The Depressed Center Bracket is used to load large but fragile goods. I have prepared a power transformer for it. You can load it by editing properties of the Depressed Center Bracket in Surveyor mode. Like Side Bolsters, the earlier schnabel has been pre-installed on the Depressed Center Bracket.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: The Chinese D38 Schnabel Car is a special type of freight car, used to transport super heavy or oversized goods. Generally speaking, it has two huge 'arms' to grab the goods, and make them become a part of itself. This pack includes the D38 Schnabel cars in the grey livery.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian
